Product.title: Product
Product.description: Represents a product in the inventory.

sku.description: Stock Keeping Unit - a unique identifier for the product.

Location.title: Location
Location.description: Represents a physical location where products are stored.

name.description: Name of the location (e.g., Warehouse A, Shelf 2).

StockLevel.title: StockLevel
StockLevel.description: Represents the quantity of a product at a specific location.

id.description: Unique identifier for the stock level record.

quantity.description: The quantity of the product at this location.

StockAlert.title: StockAlert
StockAlert.description: Represents an alert that is triggered when stock levels are low.

id.description: Unique identifier for the stock alert.

threshold.description: The minimum quantity that triggers the alert.

alertDate.description: Date and time the alert was triggered.

resolved.description: Indicates whether the alert has been resolved.

StockMovement.title: StockMovement
StockMovement.description: Represents a movement of stock, such as a delivery or a sale.

id.description: Unique identifier for the stock movement.

fromLocationId.description: Reference to Location.  Location the product moved from. (Relationship: Location 1:N StockMovement)

toLocationId.description: Reference to Location. Location the product moved to. (Relationship: Location 1:N StockMovement)

quantity.description: The quantity of the product that was moved.

movementDate.description: Date and time the stock movement occurred.

type.description: The type of stock movement (e.g., Delivery, Sale, Transfer).

definition.description: Stores product information. Includes productId as a param.

params.name: productId
params.description: The unique identifier for the product.

definition.description: Stores location information.  Includes locationId as a param.

params.name: locationId
params.description: The unique identifier for the location.

definition.description: Stores loan records for products. Includes loanId as a param.

params.name: loanId
params.description: The unique identifier for the loan.

definition.description: Stores stock movement records. Includes movementId as a param.

params.name: movementId
params.description: The unique identifier for the stock movement.

definition.description: Stores stock alerts specific to a user.  Includes userId and stockAlertId as params.

params.name: userId
params.description: The unique identifier for the user.

params.name: stockAlertId
params.description: The unique identifier for the stock alert.

firestore.reasoning: The Firestore structure for StockWise is designed to provide a secure and scalable inventory management system. It prioritizes authorization independence and simplifies security rules through denormalization. User-owned data (stock alerts) is segregated under user-specific paths. Core data such as Products, Locations, Loans, and Movements are stored at the root for global access and simplified querying, especially for reporting purposes.
